name: task-handler.yml
configuration:
spring: profiles: montana data: solr: host: "http://proxy.art-platform.io:8081/solr" datasource: driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-montana/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-task-handler" username: "postgres" password: "1" jpa: database: postgresql hibernate: ddl-auto: none database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect properties: hibernate.session.events.auto: ru.rtkit.nttm.logger.interceptor.JdbcLoggingInterceptor hibernate: dialect: ru.rtkit.nttm.common.configs.PostgreSQL95JsonDialect temp: use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false rabbitmq: host: rabbitmq-montana username: admin password: admin listener: simple: acknowledge-mode: none input_queue: camunda output_queue: audit coordination_queue: coord send_email_queue: send_email logger_queue: logger logger_admin_queue: logger_admin sla_queue: sla dwh_events_queue: dwh_events crm_nx_notifications_queue: crm_nx_notifications servlet: multipart: enabled: true file-size-threshold: 2KB max-file-size: 20MB max-request-size: 20MB jackson: serialization: fail_on_empty_beans: false deserialization: # dates came from Actitvit as timestamp im milliseconds, so disable nanoseconds read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false application: name: "nttm-task-handler" server: port: 8080 app: o2oSlaDefault: 28800 #секунды debugEnabled: true defaultClassNPId: 1 defaultClassNPIdForDigitalEconomy: 8 ClassNPIdForDigitalEconomyC2: 9 digitalEconomyVipId: 3 variouscatalog: headtable: "cat_various_catalog" description: "description" cms: "cms" manual: "manual" privilege: registrationAlias: "can_register_ticket" ticket: textOfChangeCurator: "Подразделение-куратор: %s -> %s
Куратор: %s -> %s" zonedDateTimeFormat: "MM/dd/yyyy - HH:mm:ss Z" message: changeCurator: groupNotAssign: "Группа не назначена" curatorNotAssign: "Куратор не назначен" curatorNotAssigned: "Куратор не назначался" status: forGEP1: "Группа по работе с претензиями ГД" forGEP2: "1ЛТП Тест" unitGEP: "377" # id подразделения ГЭП в cat_unit ltp2: "155" # id 2 ЛТП в cat_unit_role ltp1: "1" # id 1 ЛТП в cat_unit_role diagName: "Диагностика" independentProcName1: "gep_request" mainProcName: "ttm_rule2" mainProcNameNetwork: "network_ticket_process" mainProcNameO2O: "ttm_o2o" closed: "0" inProgress: "1" magistralStation: 1 magistralLine: 2 task: type: registration: 1 #Регистрация Клиентские diagnostic: 2 #Диагностика для клиентских decision: 4 #Решение для клиентских registrationNet: 15 #Регистрация Сетевые autoCloseTaskTypeId: 27 #Автозакрытие (технический) waitingTaskType: 21 #Ожидаине code: cancelCloseCode: 30 #Регистрация отменена integration: camunda: waitTime: 4320 systems: source_systems[0]: # source sistem id for "Netrac.Teoco" is 6 sourceSystemName: "Netrac.Teoco" sourceSystemId: 6 timeout: 10 needDeferredStart: true tasks: registrationTaskTypeId: 15 diagTaskTypeId: 16 autoCloseTaskTypeId: 27 closedStatusId: 1 queueStatusId: 2 workStatusId: 3 closeMessage: "Авторегистрация Netrac Teoco" netrac: status: alarm-add: 1 alarm-close: 2 equip-close: 4 jwt: expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h} server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-montana:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/ errorMessage: notRegistrationCode: code: "NOT_REGISTRATION_ROLE" message_ru: "Отсутствует роль на регистрацию инцидента!" subscriptions: # Параметр отвечает за наполнение фэйковыми данными(email, телефоны) у CMS контактов. # При доабвлении нового API для получения контактов CMS нужно реализовать проверку # if (cleanEmail) FillFaceDataForCMSContacts.fillFaceDataForCMSContacts(contact); # На продуктовой среде параметр false clean_email: true storage: user: nttm_user pass: doc2 url: http://10.42.45.213:7003/services docbase: shd_rt ext_type: TT ext_kind: FILE url_path: /nttm-task-handler/api/storage/files/ bpm: activiti_url: "" activiti_creds: "admin:admin" camunda_url: "http://nttm-camunda-montana:8080/rest/engine/default/" camunda_creds: "" url: prefix: http://nttm.montana.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io/#/tickets/editticket;id= surms: http://10.28.97.89:8080/nttm-intgr-surms/api/surms nttm: prefix: "http://nttm.montana.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io" auth: username: "1net" password: "123456" jhipster: http: version: V_1_1 # To use HTTP/2 you will need to activate TLS (see application-tls.yml) # CORS is only enabled by default with the "dev" profile, so BrowserSync can access the API cors: allowed-origins: "*" allowed-methods: "*" allowed-headers: "*" exposed-headers: "Authorization,Link,X-Total-Count" allow-credentials: true max-age: 1800 security: authentication: jwt: # This token must be encoded using Base64 (you can type `echo 'secret-key'|base64` on your command line) base64-secret: ODJiODNkYWRkMzA4ZTNiOTk5ODY1YmMwODVlZTExNzMwMGU0N2QzOWIwYWVjMDc2NTNjYzA1OTYyNWUzMjNlNWU4ZTJmZDJkZDhhNTdkMTNiMzEzYWM1ODE2YTUyODhhYWJlN2EzYzJkZjdjNDU0YjE5ODAwYzUwOGZkZGVkNTg= # Token is valid 24 hours token-validity-in-seconds: 86400 token-validity-in-seconds-for-remember-me: 2592000 mail: # specific JHipster mail property, for standard properties see MailProperties from: persistmonolit@localhost base-url: http://nttm.montana.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io metrics: # DropWizard Metrics configuration, used by MetricsConfiguration logs: # Reports Dropwizard metrics in the logs enabled: false report-frequency: 60 # in seconds argus: # Тестовые сервера servers: # Макро регион Урал UR: endpoint: "http://10.184.86.37:37204/rt-gate/STPService" username: "CMS_USER" password: "Route343" # Макро регион Северо-Запад SZ: endpoint: "http://10.160.16.142:8080/rt-gate/STPService" username: "CMS_USER" password: "Pfzdrb_>k" # Макро регион Юг UF: endpoint: "http://10.160.16.142:8080/rt-gate/STPService" username: "CMS_USER" password: "Pfzdrb_>k" #Макро регион Волга PR: endpoint: "http://10.160.16.142:8080/rt-gate/STPService" username: "CMS_USER" password: "Pfzdrb_>k" skuf: connection-properties: connection-timeout: 5000 read-timeout: 5000 url: "http://10.242.0.114/arsys/services/ARService?server=u00skuf-ar4&webService=RTL:HPD_IncidentInterface_Create_WS__c" username: "NTTM" password: "Q0OFCPQJQJ3DRUDC" stp: localities: 1,2,6,8 orpon: url: "http://proxy.art-platform.io:8083/PONWebServices/WsSearchAddrElByFullNamePortType" external-systems: eip, eip_test dwh: task-url: "http://10.31.70.120/FWS/nttm-cmsdwh-adapter/trouble-tickets/task" ticket-url: "http://10.31.70.120/FWS/nttm-cmsdwh-adapter/trouble-tickets/ticket" login: "nttm_login" password: "test" test-author-units: 0 scheduler: enabled: false fixedDelay: 3600000 cmsTtBind: defaultWaitingTimeInDays: 14 recovery: enabled: false fixedDelay: 300000 management: endpoints: web: path-mapping: prometheus: metrics base-path: / exposure: include: prometheus health.solr.enabled: false logging: config: configs/log4j2.yml level: org.hibernate: error org.hibernate.SQL: error org.zalando.logbook: info logbook: format: style: http exclude: - "**/metrics"
